#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define N 1005
using namespace std;

char A[N], B[N];

bool print_me[N];

int main(){

	int t;

	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		memset(print_me, false, sizeof(print_me));
		cin>>A>>B;

		int len = 0;
		for(int i=0;B[i]!='\0';i++)	len++;

		for(int i=0;A[i]!='\0';){
			bool ok = true;
			for(int j=0;B[j]!='\0';j++){
				if(A[i+j] != B[j]){
					ok = false;
					break;
				}
			}
			if(ok)	i += len;
			else{
				print_me[i] = true;
				i++;
			}
		}

		bool O = true;
		for(int i=0;A[i]!='\0';i++){
			if(print_me[i]){
				O = false;
				cout<<A[i];
			}
		}
		if(O)	cout<<0;
		cout<<endl;
	}

	//system("pause");
	return 0;
}
